description.value: At 20th level, you are immune to all transmutation spells and effects unless you are a willing target. You can also use @Compendium[pf1.spells.t44p3oeq43jwcgwg]{Polymorph, Greater} at will as a spell-like ability with a caster level equal to your bloodrager level targeting only yourself. These effects function even while youâ€™re not bloodraging.
